# *auto-generated*
A template repository for building python packages.

## Installation
```sh
*auto-generated*
```

## Usage
```sh
# 1) Download wheels and copy payload into clipboard
cfg copy "requests==2.32.3"

# 2) On target machine, restore from clipboard and install offline
cfg install --temp-dir temp
```

### Options
* `cfg copy <package_spec> --no-deps`
  * Only package the top-level wheel, do not download dependencies.
* `cfg install --no-deps`
  * Install without dependency resolution.

## Requirements
```txt
*auto-generated*
```
